title: That Night Filled Mountain
description: As his job disappears and his marriage dissolves, Marcus Hatchet faces a meltdown under the weight of years spent denying his instincts. When an opportunity to live on his own terms finally arrives, Hatchet wagers friendship, fatherhood, freedom, and sanity to change his world. He will take from those who have everything in order to gain something he can call his own. A free and honorable life.
author: O'Fuel
